titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the tax credit for electricity produced from open-loop biomass.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/25/2006--Introduced. Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions allowing a tax credit for producing electricity from open-loop biomass to: (1) eliminate the requirement that open-loop biomass be segregated from other waste material; (2) limit the amount of such credit based on consumption of nonqualified fuel by a open-loop biomass facility; and (3) allow the placing in service of additional open-loop biomass facilities with additional capacity.
